text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a DOCBODY

name: ActClassDocumentBody
title: ActClassDocumentBody
description: A context that distinguishes the body of a document from the document header. This is seen, for instance, in HTML documents, which have discrete <head> and <body> elements.
